task.prompt: In a fundraiser car wash activity, the 5th graders raised $147 on Friday. On Saturday, they made $7 more than twice their Friday earnings. Their earnings on Sunday are $78 more than their earnings on Friday. How much did they earn in three days?

steps.c: Plan: identify requirements from task. Task: In a fundraiser car wash activity, the 5th graders raised $147 on Friday. On Saturday, they made $7 more than twice their Friday earnings. Their earnings on Sunday are $78 more than their earnings on Friday. How much did they earn in three days?
